messages.speech: We want all attendees to have an enjoyable experience at PyCon Africa. All attendees - delegates, speakers, volunteers, sponsors, exhibitors and organisers - are expected to abide by this Code of Conduct.

messages.textToSpeech: We want all attendees to have an enjoyable experience at PyCon Africa. All attendees - delegates, speakers, volunteers, sponsors, exhibitors and organisers - are expected to abide by this Code of Conduct.
